entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melfort
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melfort 10:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -23.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -26.5°C
Wind: SSE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
